price: 66. Mayee’, Cilmigooda xagga Aakhirada waa wax yar oo aan dhammeyn. Waxaybase ka qabaan shaki, wayna ka indha la' yihiin xaggeeda.
arabic: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهَاۖ بَلۡ هُم مِّنۡهَا عَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bali iddāraka ʿil'muhum fī al-ākhirati bal hum fī shakkin min'hā bal hum min'hā ʿamūna
